text:
@NikkiHaley @standamericanow Do @NikkiHaley & the rest of the the @GOP have the courage to stand up to @realDonaldTrump, who clearly thinks that the economic slowdown from containing the virus will hurt his reelection chances more than a “steady” rate of hundreds of daily deaths”

https://t.co/zbXTPDWiWA
